00033 #if defined(USE_SYSTEM_ASSERT) || defined(NDEBUG)
00034 #include <assert.h>
00035 #else
00036 #include <stdio.h>
00037 #undef assert
00038 #define assert(expr) ((expr) || fprintf(stderr,"*** WARNING ***: Assertion (%s) failed in file %s at line %d.\n",#expr,__FILE__,__LINE__))
00039 #endif
